net.xylophones.micro.game.mb
Class ScreenChooser

java.lang.Object
  net.xylophones.micro.game.mb.ScreenChooser

public class ScreenChooser
extends java.lang.Object

Simple class for choosing which screen to display. Rather than passing around a midlet instance, pass this around instead. Safer.

Author:
william@xylophones.net

public void displayScreen(int screen)

Quietly fails if given an invalid screen
